title: Nebraska Residents Weary Of Keystone XL Pipeline Debate
teaser: As Congress and President Obama go toe to toe on the Keystone XL pipeline, that battle is resonating across oil country and especially in  Nebraska, the state at the center of the controversial project. Supporters there want the pipeline approved as soon as possible. Opponents are satisfied with any delay that puts off construction.
